alert.note: Alert for Marion; Marshall; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 9:31AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GREENE...SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE... MONONGALIA...WETZEL...NORTHWESTERN PRESTON...MARSHALL AND MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 AM EDT... At 931 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Pine Grove, or 10 miles east of New Martinsville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Fairmont, Waynesburg, Westover, Mannington, Star City, Pleasant Valley, Winfield, Fairdale, Barrackville, Point Marion, and Monongah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 13. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 131 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Marion; Marshall; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Wetzel
